description:
The eternal struggle continues! Battle against a computer-controlled opponent for supremacy on the field of fisticuffs. Do YOU have what it takes to emerge victorious?

Popularized in 2008 by "The Lizard-Spock Expansion", an episode of the hit American sitcom "The Big Bang Theory", Rock-Paper-Scissors-Lizard-Spock (RPSLS) is a five-gesture expansion of the classic hand game Rock-Paper-Scissors (also known as Roshambo or Rochambeau). It operates on the same basic principle, but includes two additional weapons -- the lizard (formed by the hand as a sock-puppet-like mouth) and Spock (formed by the "Star Trek" Vulcan salute).

Don't know the rules? No problem! Our application includes a diagram of all possible moves and their effects which can be accessed at any time during gameplay. Before long, you'll be RPSLSing with the best of 'em!

Kill time at work or school, dazzle your friends, harass Jim Parsons at the supermarket... all this and more is possible through the magic of Rock-Paper-Scissors-Lizard-Spock. So, what are you waiting for? This is it. The time is now. Download RPSLS today and become the man and/or woman you've always dreamed of becoming! I'm on a horse.
